titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for temporary duty-free treatment for semiconductor plating lines.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/5/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment, through December 31, 2001, of plating lines for semiconductors and integrated circuits.
